programme.title: Ajari Aku Melupakanmu
programme.desc: Bima yang hilang ingatan terkejut ketika mendengar bahawa anak yang didukungnya adalah anaknya bersama Alya.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep195
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep67
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep3
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep167
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep197
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Aku Menyebutnya Tampan dan Pemberani
programme.desc: Asep berhijrah ke Jakarta dan bertemu Tania, mampukah dia menakluki ibu kota dan hati Tania?

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep19
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisar tentang empat orang lelaki yang hadir untuk satu sama lain dan saling membantu menghadapi sakit hati (lara ati) yang mereka alami dalam kehidupan masing-masing.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep47
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep22
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil's Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Pension
programme.desc: When four different couples head to a motel for different reasons, truths are revealed and secrets are uncovered.

programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep189190
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5657
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1617
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47234724
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep191192
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1855
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep11
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhangs custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are finally revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam and the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop. The infernal gates are open to the worst of times...

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Dukes daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mus lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Lis father

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep27
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep68
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep69
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep31
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep32
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep20
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevans successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep21
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevans successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep31
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Honey Bunny In Treasure Hunt Ep1

programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.desc: Gaurav treats his widowed father, Janardhan, with love and care for raising him and his brother single-handedly. When he learns about Janardhan's childhood love, he decides to reunite them.

programme.desc: Gold Medal Tango - Elmo, Rosita, and Chris are making a doggy obstacle course for Tango. They find a hula hoop that Tango could jump through, but it wont stand up. What if they put the hoop through the slats of two chairs? Lets try!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep12
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Its national bubble week and Rosita and Zoe want to fill all of Sesame Street with lots of bubbles. But theyre tired from blowing bubbles. What if they place an egg rack in front of a fan and spin it through a tub of soapy water? Lets try!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep13
programme.desc: Nani Bird Visits - Big Birds aunt, Nani Bird, is visiting Sesame Street from Hawaii. Nani Bird shares with Elmo, Abby and Nina how to say aloha, make paper flower lei, and hula; special things Big Bird and his family do in Hawaii.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep14
programme.desc: Family Album - Gabrielle and Tamir are making a family photo album for Grandma Nell. They learn about melanin and that sometimes people in a family can look the same and sometimes they can look different but are still the same family.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep15
programme.desc: Rockin With Elmo And Abby - Elmo and Abby learn how to compromise and combine their two favorite songs, creating the Best Friend Song.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep16
programme.desc: Read-And-Share - Elmo, Gabrielle, and Ji-Young are at an Outdoor Library. When Ji-Young cant find just one book with all the things that make her special, she writes her own comic book with the help of her friends about some of the things that make her special.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep17
programme.desc: Just Right! - Elmo, Mia, Charlie, James, and Baby Bear are playing out the story of Goldilocks and the Three Bears. When James says Mia cant play Goldilocks because she doesnt look like Goldilocks, Mia stands up for herself and says thats not fair.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep18
programme.desc: Art Rocks! - Elmo, Abby, and Big Bird are painting pictures in the community garden, but they dont have any paper. What if they paint on rocks that are strong and smooth? Lets try!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep19
programme.desc: Cinderella's New Shoes - Rosita helps Cinderella realize that she can be a princess and play. The best part of the day was becoming friends.

programme.desc: Count On - Grover has a new job as a kitty sitter. He counts the kitties to see how many there are altogether. The Count shares a counting shortcut counting on! Instead of counting from the beginning, Grover learns to count on from where he left off.

programme.desc: Return Of The Curse Of The Weredude - Patches the Weredude enlists Chester to help him woo his girlfriend Elvira, but after Chester falls for the same girl, Bunnicula and Harold must diffuse the situation.

programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Tot is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the others body.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Spook
programme.desc: In an abandoned villa, three children witness a fierce fight between Jakob Stocking and a building contractor. Jakob kills him but returns later with his lawyer to turn himself in. As questions pile up, two detectives uncover a long-kept family secret.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzis surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her holy reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: Blood Pressure
programme.desc: Nicole, a 41-year-old wife bored with her mundane life, receives letters from a mysterious observer. Enticed, she plays along but they soon get out of hand and threaten to tear apart her relationship with her husband and two teenage children.

programme.title: Home Front
programme.desc: Called up to fight in the Algerian war in 1960, four veterans are forced to confront their past more than forty years after they have returned to France. Despite keeping silent all this while, small events spark painful memories of their untold stories.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parents house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the Karnaval brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: Seeing Thunder
programme.desc: Seeing Thunder is a documentary that threads on the hidden conundrums in the deaf world. Within the deaf and the hearing world is a fine line so whats it like to live within as an in-betweener?

programme.title: Wonderfully Beautiful
programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: The Lost Son
programme.desc: A street kid discovers the body of a convicted murderer who was only recently released from prison. Inspector Mehmet's investigation leads him to a foundation that helps homeless kids. But something is fishy about this charity.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Tot is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the others body.

programme.title: Death Comes to Venice
programme.desc: When an art conservator mysteriously drowns in the Canale dei Marani in Venice, his widow Anna investigates the suspicious circumstances of his death. In the course of doing so, she is led into a jungle of lies, fraud, and art theft.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parents and Irenes marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Love In Bangkok
programme.desc: Architect Laura Brunel is sent to Bangkok to create plans for a mall. She meets Marc, a manager of an NGO that runs orphanages, and falls in love with him. However, she must tell him that her project will involve the destruction of the local orphanage.

programme.title: Pride & Glory
programme.desc: Edward Norton and Colin Farrell star in this crime thriller that blurs the line between morality and duty as it asks the question: What does it mean to be loyal? In New York City, a homicide detective Ray Tierney (Norton) is assigned to investigate the pr

programme.title: The Hobbit
programme.desc: Bilbo Baggins lives a simple life with his fellow hobbits in the shire, until the wizard Gandalf arrives and convinces him to join a group of dwarves on a quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor from the fearsome dragon Smaug.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 6
programme.desc: Michael fishes for trouble in a toy store with pop-up books that contain live animals and, at a health food store, he makes a woman's day by showing her how to milk almonds. Later, a mummy causes an employee to question ancient curses.

Then at a military outfitting store, Michael and an employee put together a clothing display that puts the "man" in mannequin.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 16
programme.desc: When Bernadette won't go into labor, all her friends try to help out; and Howard learns that Bernadette has already chosen their son's name.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 17
programme.desc: While Leonard struggles to secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy, Howard and Bernadette struggle with who should work and who should stay with the kids.

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: Hobbit, The-Desolation Of Smaug
programme.desc: The second in a trilogy of films adapting the enduringly popular masterpiece The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien, The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug continues the adventures of the title character Bilbo Baggins (Martin Freeman) as he journeys with the Wizard Gandalf (Ian McKellen) and thirteen Dwarves, led by Thorin Oakenshield (Richard Armitage) on an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor.

programme.title: The Flash S9 8

programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr play a game of "Put-Pocket" at a grocery store, then get jumpy at the park after taking over each other's cell phones. And tonight's big loser learns that when you gotta goyou gotta go.

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: Syriana: noun a geographical term referring to those Middle East hot spots that have proven volatile with regard to the security of the United States; a place in the Middle East where trouble is always breaking out. Based on the best-selling book See No Evil: The True Story of a Ground Soldier in the CIA's War on Terrorism by Robert Baer, this timely political thriller takes a penetrating look at the efforts of the U.S. intelligence-gathering community in the Middle East, weaving together several storylines ranging from American foreign policy and the CIA's role in it to the oil industry and terrorism. Welcome to Syriana.

The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.desc: A small town decides to use a very potent and untested pesticide on yellow-jacket wasps plaguing the town However, the species has now mutated and is now stronger, more aggressive, hungrier and interested in LIVE human meat.

programme.desc: Trains - Gregg gets special access to learn how the ultimate train is made: a huge 187-tonne, five-carriage electric train. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits an HS2 construction site.

programme.title: The Hunt S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Living with Predators - It's hard to imagine a world without lions, tigers and polar bears. But the earth's wildest places are shrinking, and people are coming into deadly conflict with these ancient carnivores.

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The third series of Race Across the World reaches its epic climax as the pairs complete their gruelling journey across Canada. Which team will triumph?

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Yorkshire - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to see the Owens in the Yorkshire Dales.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Shaquille O'Neal - Shaquille O'Neal joins Bear in the Adirondack Mountains of Upstate New York, where they deal with dense forest, leeches and steep cliffs.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Africa Titans - The death of a wild black rhino after a fight with another dominant male, and a 14-year-old blind black rhino becomes the new ambassador for the species.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life and Death on the Plains - Liuwa Plains is a remote grassland and one of Africas last wild places. Only the toughest of Africas wildlife can survive here. Witness an extraordinary story of perseverance, adaptation, and survival in this extreme habitat.

programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Eclipse of the Pride Lands - How close do you want to get to a lion? The staff must get close enough to place radio transmitting collars on them to keep track of the lion population.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Remarkable Reptiles - Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. Theyve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Living with Sharks - Sharks are among the planets oldest and most highly evolved predators. Along southern Africas coast, pioneers dedicate their lives to learning more about these creatures, and spreading awareness about their plight. These people do all they can to find safe ways of living with sharks.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lethal By Design - Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While its true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Predator's Plight - There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Trials of Olimba - Enter the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Lost Prince - When Mizumus status drops during adolescence, his alpha female mother disowns him. Follow his challenging journey to find a new clan while overcoming the threats of charging hippos, hungry crocodiles, a pack of wild dogs, and a hyena-eating leopard.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hot Springs Pack - Meet a close-knit family of wild dogs who work together to raise pups and hunt enough food to feed the whole pack. While their well-coordinated hunts are successful, the wet season brings challenges when some of the team strikes out on their own.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Heir to the Clan - Spotty, a female hyena cub, is destined to be leader of the Chimbwe clan that lives in the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley. But she has yet to prove herself. Witness her fight to find her place in this savagely competitive family.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mini Giants - Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mother's Darlings - Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa's Baboons - The baboon is one of the worlds most successful and dominant primates. Ranging throughout Africa, we explore how these fascinating animals have adapted to thrive in mountains, deserts, along the shores of acidic lakes, and even on the edge of a mighty ocean.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Amazon Monkeys - In a protected forest on the southern edge of Brazils Amazon Rainforest, lives one of the most intelligent and agile monkeys of the New World - the white-whiskered spider monkey. Their long tails are like a 5th limb and they rarely leave the treetops for the forest floor. They are the ambassadors of their forest.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.desc: The Mystery Of Flight 1628 And The Giant Thunderbi - One of the most-famous UFO cases of all time occurs in the skies above Alaska when an unidentified flying object pursues a Boeing 747.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A G'day Down Under - Jack Maxwell heads to Australia to experience the country's drinking culture with his mates.

programme.title: Luxury Uncovered S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Emirates Palace, Abu Dhabi - Emirates Palace is truly jaw dropping. Jenny follows the hotel's gold specialist, gets a lesson in deportment from the "ladies in red".

programme.title: Luxury Uncovered S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wellesley, London, England - A boutique town house hotel in the heart of Knightsbridge, The Wellesley is a small but perfectly form luxury bolthole for discerning guests.

programme.title: Hotel Impossible S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Waterpan-Gate - Anthony addresses morale and leadership issues at Capital Plaza Hotel.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Utah - Bert travels through Utah for thrills at a park and a resort.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Las Vegas - Bert experiences sky-high thrills at the Stratosphere in Las Vegas.

programme.title: American Monster S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Anything For You - The Snyders are thrilled when their 34-year-old son Mike finally starts a family with his sweetheart. But after being diagnosed with a terrible illness, Mike vanishes.

programme.title: Top Secret Swimming Holes S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Palau's Jellyfish Lake - Dive into Palau's Jellyfish Lake, go cliff jumping in Maui and more!

programme.title: Destination Fear S4 Ep6

programme.title: Paranormal Lockdown S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Oliver House - Nick and Katrina must determine if a historic Massachusetts manor is unsafe for tourists.

programme.title: Kindred Spirits S7 Ep10
programme.desc: The Country Club Murders - Amy, Adam and Chip investigates a West Virginia country club notorious for an unsolved double homicide on a secluded lovers' lane.

programme.title: Evil Things S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Room And The Nanny - A couple moves into their new home to find that more than just old toys have been left behind. A scared family's life takes a turn when they hire a new nanny.

programme.title: Ghost Brothers: Haunted Houseguests S1 Ep4

programme.title: Uncommon Grounds S1 Ep3

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep49
programme.desc: Rupert and the Sailing Race - Whilst down at the stream with Rupert and Co, the fox twins mis-read the words to one of Ping Pong's spells which causes everyone to shrink. Delighted with their new size and ignoring warnings from Rupert, the twins leap into their toy boat and immediately sail into danger. Can Rupert, Ping Pong, Edward and Bill rescue them before they capsize or drift under the bridge and out to sea?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep50
programme.desc: Rupert and the Flying Dragon - Rupert tries to help Ming to fly by attaching a balloon to him. But the wind blows and Ming is carried away. Rupert and Bill try and chase after Ming, while Ping Pong, unaware of what's going on, works with Edward and Raggety to make a proper flying spell for baby dragons. This is soon abandoned though when Ming is blown out to sea, and Rupert has to come and asking Pong for help. The friends leap in the flying car and chase after Ming, as she floats helplessly around Nutwood. Finally, its Raggety's magic that saves the day, and Ming is safely rescued. The friends agree to wait until Ming's older before helping her to fly and give her an airborne ride in Rupert's flying car instead!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep51
programme.desc: Rupert Saves Christmas - While riding his sleigh in the sky towards the North Pole on Christmas Eve, Crinkle the snow elf falls & lands in Nutwood. Worried about the fact Santa won't be able to deliver any presents without him Rupert & friends help Crinkle attract Santa's attention in the sky by building a huge magical daisy chain. It begins to fall apart as Crinkle climbs up high and so the gang decorate a magical Christmas tree that can be seen from the sky. As they hear santa's sleigh approaching crinkle climbs the tree & is reunites with Santa ensuring all presents are delivered on Christmas day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep52
programme.desc: Rupert and the Snow Key - Jack Frost has misplaced his Snow Key which unlocks the Spring. Without the key it will be snowy & Winter in Nutwood forever. Rupert & friends search Nutwood to help find the key unknowing Raggety has found the special key & is keeping it very safe. Will the gang find it in time & unlock Spring in time for the flowers & plants in Nutwood?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep49
programme.desc: What's That Green Hairy Stuff? - Jess and the puppies find some strange green hairy stuff growing under the water barrel. The puppies are scared of it and Jess promises them that he'll find out what it is at once. Hey, that's the big question! Jess thinks the green hairy stuff might be grass. He goes to ask Baa, who's a grass expert. Baa, Billie and Jess compare the green hairy stuff and ordinary grass using Billie's magnifying glass. It isn't grass but it is a plant. Mimi knows all about plants so they go to ask her about the green hairy stuff. She shows them the green hairy tops of carrots but they aren't like Jess's green hairy stuff either. Mimi's sure she's seen this green hairy stuff in other places around the farm. Jess thinks they should look around and see where it grows. There's green hairy stuff growing all over the farm in cool, damp places. Horace knows all about damp cool places. Perhaps he can help! Horace tells them that the green hairy stuff is a plant called moss and it's not scary at all. The puppies agree

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep50
programme.desc: How Can I Find My Friends? - Jess's friends have planned a special surprise but he can't find any of them to find out what it is! How can he find his friends? Hey, that's the Big Question! He finds a trail of Willow's hoof prints but they stop at a puddle. Then they follow a trail of wool from Baa but that stops too. They find a walking haystack but it turns out to be Mimi. Jess is baffled. He can't find anyone else! Mimi helps him realise that he followed clues which led him to her but before Jess can ask her anything else she rushes off. Hmm, thinks Jess, maybe if we follow the clues we found earlier they might lead us to our friends and the special surprise. Jess, Joey and Jinx follow the clues and finds all of their friends waiting for them at a special Follow the Clues surprise picnic! Jess found his friends by following the clues AND he's answered the Big Question! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep51
programme.desc: Why Are Acorns Buried Under The Tree? - Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep52
programme.desc: How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird? - Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Olivia Ep13
programme.desc: Olivia And Grandma's Visit - Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia Ep14
programme.desc: Olivia Is Invited To Dinner - Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Olivia Ep15
programme.desc: Olivia Measures Up - After Olivia teases Ian for being too short for a ride, Father mentions that someday Ian may be the taller sibling. Olivia employs a variety of comical methods to stop Ian from growing. She eventually comes to terms with her own height with the help of a great pair of shoes!

programme.title: Olivia Ep16
programme.desc: Olivia And The Old West - The class bullfrog is lose, and Mrs. Hogenmuller leaves Olivia in charge as she goes to track it down. Olivia imagines herself as the sheriff of a Wild West town, keeping order and defending against a stampede of giant bullfrogs. But can shedo it alone, or will she need a little help from Francine?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep49
programme.desc: Why Mole Lives Underground - You see there was a time when Mole didn't live underground. She had tiny weenie ears where every little sound made her ears hurt. Unfortunately Tinga Tinga could be a very noisy place. Then one night when Elephant's snoring, Jackal's howling and Owl's twit-twooing get too much Mole decides to DIG. She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep50
programme.desc: Why Squirrel Gathers Nuts - You see there was a time when Squirrel didn't gather nuts; she was far too busy braiding her bushy tail. Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep51
programme.desc: Why Meerkat Is Always On The Look Out - You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep52
programme.desc: Why Cheetah Has Tears - You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brians untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep27
programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep14
programme.desc: Bumbleberry/Leaf's Still Cool - Rocksy discovers that Verry Berry is fascinated with bees, but when Berry innocently cosplays as a bee, she disappears into the hive and doesn't emerge. / After reuniting with an old friend, Leaf goes to great, unsafe lengths to prove that he's still a cool daredevil.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Ruperts Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert and the Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep3
programme.desc: Rupert Builds a Nest - Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert and the Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her twinkle'

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What's Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!
