programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names Fuzzy takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the PAW Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

The weekly program zooms in on the details of trending news items and zooms out to give viewers the bigger picture. With in-depth analysis and current perspective, Zoom in takes you on a journey beyond the daily headlines.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: AFLW - Round 7 - St Kilda v GWS Giants Ep31
programme.desc: With just three more games to come after this weekend before the Finals begin, wins are more important than ever. In Round 7 St Kilda host the GWS Giants.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 7 - Geelong v Fremantle Ep32
programme.desc: The Geelong Cats host the Fremantle Dockers in Round 7 of the AFLW.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep82
programme.desc: Before the ABC's special Referendum Night coverage, a national edition of ABC News, covering the day's top stories and the latest news from across the country. Presented by Jeremy Fernandez.

programme.title: The Voice Referendum: Preview - Preview Ep1
programme.desc: As the votes are cast and counted, join the ABC for the most comprehensive coverage of Referendum Day. Our expert panel featuring Antony Green brings you live updates of the count, looking at state-wide and regional trends.

programme.title: The Voice Referendum: Polls Close - Polls Close Ep2
programme.desc: As the votes are cast and counted, join the ABC for the most comprehensive coverage of Referendum Day. Our expert panel featuring Antony Green brings you live updates of the count, looking at state-wide and regional trends.

programme.title: The Voice Referendum: The Vote Count - The Vote Count Ep3
programme.desc: As the votes are cast and counted, join the ABC for the most comprehensive coverage of Referendum Day. Our expert panel featuring Antony Green brings you live updates of the count, looking at state-wide and regional trends.

programme.title: The Voice Referendum: Australia's Decision - Australia's Decision Ep4
programme.desc: As the votes are cast and counted, join the ABC for the most comprehensive coverage of Referendum Day. Our expert panel featuring Antony Green brings you live updates of the count, looking at state-wide and regional trends.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Lach and his team set a target of 88 feral bulls but quotas are the last thing on their mind after Charlie's accident. After locating two thirds of the feral bulls, Clarry calls on his Dad to help transport the cattle.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Josh learns how gardens heal us, Costa gets paving, Sophie creates home floristry, Clarence tours a habitat corridor, Hannah gardens on clay soil, plus we meet African communities uniting through growing food.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep24
programme.desc: We are your passport to the world. Our stories, told through the ABC's network of foreign correspondents, take you to incredible places where you'll meet the people and see the forces shaping our world. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: Four Corners Ep37
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep82
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep25
programme.desc: Leigh Sales introduces the Logie award-winning series voted Australia's Most Popular Current Affairs Program. Immerse yourself in the life of an extraordinary Australian and their authentic stories, told in their own words.

programme.title: The Heart Guy - Promises, Promises Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - Hugh's free to leave Whyhope, so Sharna takes him to Sydney to show him the city life he thought was lost. Matt tags along to pitch his beer and gets an offer, and Charlie takes up Sharna's offer to become the new temp mayor.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep36
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Landline Ep35
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep37
programme.desc: Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and international markets, analysing what's going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep37
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep39
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Senator Patrick Dodson - Special Envoy for Reconciliation and Implementation of the Uluru Statement Ep37
programme.desc: Patrick Dodson, Senator for Western Australia and Special Envoy for Reconciliation and Implementation of the Uluru Statement from the Heart addresses the National Press Club.

programme.title: Landline Ep35
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep37
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep42
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Kathryn Robinson and James Glenday, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep42
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - The Voice Referendum Special Ep36
programme.desc: In an extended 90 minute Insiders special, David Speers and the panel break down the Voice Referendum results, looking at how the states and demos voted and what it means for Australia going forward.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep40

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep9
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes journeys to the Octagon and relive Usmans performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten for over seven years, Grant Dawsons hot streak has led him a UFC Fight Night main event on October 8 that will shake up the lightweight Top 10 as he faces surging veteran Bobby Green at the APEX in Las Vegas. Showing the best form of his career in his July finish of former champion Tony Ferguson, Green is determined to stop the rapid rise of Dawson and continue his own march to the top at 155 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
programme.desc: Main Event - Unbeaten for over seven years, Grant Dawsons hot streak has led him a UFC Fight Night main event on October 8 that will shake up the lightweight Top 10 as he faces surging veteran Bobby Green at the APEX in Las Vegas. programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Queens of the Octagon - The UFCs women champions have grown to be some of the biggest stars in the sport. On this episode, weve got a collection of the biggest stars to hold the belt. Featuring Valentina Shevchenko, Nina Nunes, Ronda Rousey, and Rose Namajunas.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.
